transactions.title: ⚠️ Transactions
transactions.adjustSearchOrFilter: ⚠️ Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.

introduction.title: ⚠️ Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: ⚠️ Global Remit ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application or website (collectively, "Services").
introduction.paragraph2: ⚠️ Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all the terms of this Privacy Policy.

informationCollected.title: ⚠️ Information We Collect
informationCollected.personalInfoContent: ⚠️ We may collect personally identifiable information, such as your name, email address, telephone number, date of birth, social security number, and government-issued identification when you register for an account or use our Services.
informationCollected.financialInfoContent: ⚠️ To provide our banking and money transfer services, we collect banking details, account numbers, transaction history, and payment information.
informationCollected.deviceInfoContent: ⚠️ When you access our Services, we automatically collect device information such as your mobile device ID, model, manufacturer, operating system, IP address, and browsing behavior.

informationUsage.title: ⚠️ How We Use Your Information
informationUsage.intro: ⚠️ We use the information we collect to

bulletPoints.improve: ⚠️ Provide, maintain, and improve our Services
bulletPoints.process: ⚠️ Process transactions and send related information
bulletPoints.verify: ⚠️ Verify your identity and prevent fraud
bulletPoints.communicate: ⚠️ Communicate with you about our Services

informationSharing.title: ⚠️ Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: ⚠️ We may share your information with

bulletPoints.providers: ⚠️ Service providers who perform services on our behalf
bulletPoints.legal: ⚠️ Legal authorities when required by law

dataSecurity.title: ⚠️ Data Security
dataSecurity.content: ⚠️ We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: ⚠️ Your Rights
yourRights.intro: ⚠️ Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to

bulletPoints.object: ⚠️ Object to processing of your information

contactUs.title: ⚠️ Contact Us
contactUs.intro: ⚠️ If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

supportChat.title: ⚠️ Global Remit Chat
supportChat.messageSentDesc: ⚠️ Your message was sent to our support team.

exitConfirm.title: 🆕 想离开聊天吗？
exitConfirm.message: 🆕 所有输入的数据都不会保存

pin.title: ⚠️ Transaction Security Setup
pin.errorRequireOneMethod: ⚠️ Please set up at least one authentication method

accountClosure.title: ⚠️ Account Closure
accountClosure.mainQuestion: ⚠️ How can we help you with your account closure?
accountClosure.processingRequest: ⚠️ We are currently processing your request and we'd like to understand why.
accountClosure.nextStepInfo: ⚠️ If you would like to close your account, the next step would be to contact us.
accountClosure.bankingIssueNote: ⚠️ If the account closure is due to a banking issue, we may be able to help resolve it without closing your account.
accountClosure.getMoreInfo: ⚠️ Get more information about account closure
accountClosure.proceedAwareness: ⚠️ To proceed with account closure, please be aware that:

points.recurringPayments: ⚠️ All recurring payments and automatic transfers will be canceled
points.remainingBalance: ⚠️ Any remaining balance will need to be transferred to another account
points.destroyCards: 🆕 您需要销毁任何相关卡
points.processDuration: 🆕 该过程可能需要长达30天才能完成

alert.title: 🆕 收到的关闭请求
alert.message: 🆕 您的帐户关闭请求已提交。下一步是联系我们的客户服务。
